metadata.title: CVE-2024-38381 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  nfc: nci: Fix uninit-value in nci_rx_work  syzbot reported the following uninit-value access issue [1]  nci_rx_work() parses received packet from ndev->rx_q. It should be validated header size, payload size and total packet size before processing the packet. If an invalid packet is detected, it should be silently discarded.
